page.title: 18ORGANISATIONS IN HALTON.
page.content: The Sunday School started in June 1980 aims to show children the Christian message is not dull but interesting, and for their participation. There are 6 leaders,42 scholars, and activities vary according to age, beginning with a simple communal service. The Youth Group , an extension of Sunday School for 11 year olds onwards began in Nov. 1982, has 11 children and 2 leaders. The aim is for physical and social activities -board games, tennis, treasure hunts, charity work etc. Various village venues are used. The Ladies Tuesday Club: began on Nov. 14, 1978, its aim being a monthly social gathering for all ladies of the village whatever age or interests to explore various topics through talks, demonstrations, slides, films; a yearly outing and Christmas party.
